menu_item.descript: french toast made with baguette, cinnamon & sugar, mixed berries, & maple syrup. served with choice of linguiça or turkey bacon.
açai berries served cold with sliced banana, fruit salad, and granola
filet mignon with two fried eggs, diced tomato salsa, rice and beans

herb omelet made with free-range eggs. choice of three: smoked ham, baby asparagus, hearts of palm, spinach, minas cheese, prato queijo, sun dried tomatoes, and tomatoes. served with potato pancakes and a mixed green salad
two poached free-range eggs, smoked ham, hollandaise sauce on top of toasted english muffins. served with potato pancakes and mixed greens salad
two poached free-range eggs, spinach, hollandaise sauce on top of toasted english muffins. served with potato pancakes and mixed greens salad
the national brazilian dish: black beans and smoked meat stew with rice, sautéed collard greens, orange wedges and farofa (includes drink & coffee)
